title: LOKI Ending Explained: Why KANG is the New Thanos of the MCU | MARVEL Breakdown
author: ScreenCrush
comment: The first 100 people to go to https://www.blinkist.com/screencrush are going to get unlimited access for 1 week to try it out. You'll also get 25% off if you want the full membership.

The reason Kang's acting over the top is that he is millions of years old and the human mind isn't designed to function that long. Kang is literally crazy at this point.
description:
The first 100 people to go to https://www.blinkist.com/screencrush are going to get unlimited access for 1 week to try it out. You'll also get 25% off if you want the full membership. 

Loki has just ended its first season with a shocking twist: Kang the Conqueror is in the MCU, and he has already won. We explain the ending of the multiversal war, how time travel works in the MCU, and what the heck has actually happened in those final shots.
